Package gui.controller

Class SavingController

java.lang.Object
gui.controller.SavingController
public class SavingController
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements the functionality of the save and end button of the informationBox of the gameScene. It saves the game to a text file with an object of the class ObjectToJsonb and the method toSerialize(). After saving it waits for two seconds and then ends the game.
Author:
Isabel, Judith

      This method implements the functionality of the save and end button. It sets the game to sleep for two seconds before closing it.
